site_name: Whipps Cross University Hospital Whipps Cross Road, Leytonstone, London, E11 1NR
description: Hybrid planning application for: 1. Outline application (all matters reserved, except for access) including demolition of some existing buildings and creation of: a) up to 1,500 residential units (C3) b) up to 5,000sqm floorspace for uses with use class E (including retail, café, restaurants, co working space, community space, gymnasium and visitor centre). 2. Full application seeking permission for the change of use of part of the existing hospital to residential (C3) and commercial/community use (E/F2)’. Re-consultation under regulation 25 of the Environmental Impact Assessment regulations following receipt of further information relating to Habitat Regulations Assessment.
